description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Fight your way through hordes of zombies with you're favorite Indiemon characters.  Choose from up to 12 different Indiemon each with unique attacks. Twin-stick shooter.
